spacing.comment: The default spacing value for Horizontal List components.

spacing-tiny.comment: The default spacing value for the tiny Horizontal List components.

spacing-small.comment: The default spacing value for the small Horizontal List components.

spacing-medium.comment: The default spacing value for the medium Horizontal List components.

spacing-large.comment: The default spacing value for the large Horizontal List components.

spacing-huge.comment: The default spacing value for the huge Horizontal List components.

delimiter.comment: The delimiter between delimited items in Horizontal List components.
